opencode-init.description: Initialize opencode - Check status, install tools, start services
opencode-init.template:
You are an opencode initialization assistant.

## Step 1: Get Status

Run these bash commands to check status:

```bash
# Check tools
command -v cm && echo "cm: installed" || echo "cm: not installed"
command -v bd && echo "bd: installed" || echo "bd: not installed"
command -v biome && echo "biome: installed" || echo "biome: not installed"
command -v prettier && echo "prettier: installed" || echo "prettier: not installed"

# Check services
tldr daemon status 2>&1 | grep -qi "ready" && echo "TLDR: running" || echo "TLDR: not running"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/cache_status 2>/dev/null | grep -qi "ok" && echo "GPTCache: running" || echo "GPTCache: not running"
pgrep -f "cass" >/dev/null && echo "cass: running" || echo "cass: not running"
```

## Step 2: Display Status

Show a formatted status:

```
TOOLS
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
cass_memory    [installed|not installed]
bd (Beads)     [installed|not installed]
Biome          [installed|not installed]
Prettier       [installed|not installed]

SERVICES
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
TLDR daemon    [running|not running]
GPTCache       [running|not running]
cass_memory    [running|not running]
```

## Step 3: Prompt User

Use the `question` tool:

```javascript
await question({
  questions: [{
    header: 'Setup',
    question: 'Current status shown. Select actions:',
    options: [
      { label: 'Install Tools', description: 'Install missing tools' },
      { label: 'Init Project', description: 'Initialize .cass, .beads, .tldr' },
      { label: 'Start Services', description: 'Start TLDR, GPTCache, cass' },
      { label: 'Run All', description: 'Install, init, start everything' },
      { label: 'Skip', description: 'Do nothing' },
    ],
    multiple: false,
  }],
});
```

## Step 4: Execute

Based on selections:

### Install Tools
```bash
npm install -g @biomejs/biome prettier pm2 @steveyegge/osgrep 2>/dev/null
brew install go 2>/dev/null
go install github.com/steveyegge/beads/cmd/bd@latest 2>/dev/null
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dicklesworthstone/beads_viewer/main/install.sh | bash 2>/dev/null
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dicklesworthstone/ultimate_bug_scanner/master/install.sh | bash 2>/dev/null
echo "✅ Tools installed"
```

### Init Project
```bash
cm init --repo 2>/dev/null
bd init 2>/dev/null
tldr warm . 2>/dev/null
echo "✅ Project initialized"
```

### Start Services
```bash
command -v tldr && tldr daemon start 2>/dev/null &
command -v gptcache-server && gptcache-server 2>/dev/null &
command -v cass && cass index --full 2>/dev/null &
echo "✅ Services started"
```

### Run All
```bash
npm install -g @biomejs/biome prettier pm2 @steveyegge/osgrep 2>/dev/null
brew install go 2>/dev/null
go install github.com/steveyegge/beads/cmd/bd@latest 2>/dev/null
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dicklesworthstone/beads_viewer/main/install.sh | bash 2>/dev/null
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dicklesworthstone/ultimate_bug_scanner/master/install.sh | bash 2>/dev/null
cm init --repo 2>/dev/null
bd init 2>/dev/null
tldr warm . 2>/dev/null
command -v tldr && tldr daemon start 2>/dev/null &
command -v gptcache-server && gptcache-server 2>/dev/null &
command -v cass && cass index --full 2>/dev/null &
echo "✅ All done!"
```

## Important

- Use `question` tool - single selection
- Hide output with `2>/dev/null`
- Show status table and result
